sense.def:
Radio
je sistem pošiljanja zvokov na daljšo razdaljo z električnimi signali.

seg.quote: We managed to establish radio communication with them.

sense.def:
Radio
je oddajanje programov, da jih javnost lahko pusluša.

seg.quote: ...one of those plays that are the stuff of radio.

sense.def:
A radio
je tudi naprava, s katero lahko poslušamo radijske oddaje.

To radio someone
pomeni tistemu človeku poslati sporočilo po radijskem oddajniku.

seg.quote: I had radioed Rick and arranged to have a car waiting for me.
The captain had radioed ahead and the security guards were waiting.
